decision_conditions: The submitted details in pursuant to condition 7 of planning permission ref: 230022PACBSD dated 13.02.2023 for "Change of use from dental practice (Use Class E(e)) to residential unit (Use Class C3) (Class MA, 56 day Prior Approval Process)" are deemed to be unsatisfactory and do not meet the requirements of the condition. The proposal would therefore fail to comply with Policies D6 and D14 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013) and Ealing SPG10.
description: Submission of a Noise Assessment Report in pursuant to condition 7 of planning permission ref: 230022PACBSD dated 13.02.2023 for: Change of use from dental practice (Use Class E(e)) to residential unit (Use Class C3) (Class MA, 56 day Prior Approval Process)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
